body.name: Air Purifiers for Bedroom Pets Smokers in Home, H13 True HEPA Filter Air Cleaner with Fragrance Sponge, Night Light, Timer, Effectively Clean 99.97% Smoke, Dust, Pollen, Pet Dander, Odors, BS-01 White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 31 mins
features: 【Advanced 3 Stages Filtration】Slevoo air purifier for home has 3-stage filtration system: pre-filter→H13 ture HEPA filter→activated carbon filter. Effectively Clean 99.97% of air pollutants, like dust, pet dander, smoke, house odor and particles as small as 0.3 microns. Relieve asthma,sneeze.

【Efficient and 20dB Operating Quietly】The air purifier for room desk featuring 360° air intake and powerful brushless motor, which can clean up to 86 ft² in 25 minutes, 215 ft² in an hour and adopts advanced and noise reduction fan blade design. lowest fan speed (20dB) to create a sleep-friendly space that's as quiet as falling leave.

【Aromatherapy Design】 Not only can this air purifier for dust get rid of air pollutants, but also available to add essential oils ( Not Inculded) for a pleasant scent. Add drops of your favorite essential oils on the aroma pad (inculded 5 pieces replacement sponge) and promote long term memory and good mood.

【User-Friendly】① A timer for 2/4/6/8/10H hours auto shut-Off when you are going to sleep or going outside. ② The blue light is optional (it serves as a nice, calming night light). ③ Filter life time indicator for your convenience. ④ Display light can be turned off to enjoy a perfect night of sleep without the effect of light.

【Fully Certified for Safety】Slevoo air purifiers for smoke are certified by multiple third-party and compliant with California’s strict standards for indoor cleaning devices. Note: Only use genuine Slevoo replacement filters (search B09Q118K98) for best results and product performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for working on the road.
reviews.reviewText: What a find. As a person that travels most of the year for work, this has been PERFECT!! I had a stay at an extended stay hotel that had severe odors all the time. I searched for a solution and found this. The design and look is really great and the ability to put drops of oil in is genius! The scent isn't overwhelming and the design makes it last for a long time. On high, the noise can be a bit louder than expected, but the noise is constant and actually relaxing while trying to sleep. The great part is that the fan speed can be adjusted while I am in my room for noise reduction and I can crank it up when I leave for the day. If you travel for work and spend time in hotels, or are looking for a smaller space, do not skip over. Hits the perfect spot of price, design and works great. My single suggestion is to make sure that you carefully order replacement filters as it is very easy to order the wrong ones like I did and get hit for the charge. My mistake, but read carefully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little device
reviews.reviewText: This works so nicely and also looks really good. I actually think the blue light on it makes it look efficient and calm. I haven’t tried the essential oil function but I think that would be a great addition as I prefer it not to smell too outdoorsy fresh. It is really quiet and I love the touch button. I’ve used it in my bedroom and kitchen, and feel comfortable moving to any section of a space I want to smell fresher. It helped freshen up cooking smells and the smoke from neighbors, and kept the bedroom air fresh for nighttime. I think it is a great product for the price especially for apartment living. It is quit small so you would probably want something bigger if you had a bigger space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works decent in small rooms but loud
reviews.reviewText: I bought 3 of these. One for bathroom, one for bedroom and one for upstairs bedroom. They are fairly decent small machines. I keep them on 24/7 on medium speed. It works really well in the bathroom especially with the essential oil sponge. It’s not always very quiteTho. Noise level is noticeable. On two of them it is loud enough it takes my attention. The one in the bathroom is not noticeable with sound. This is after a few months of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small footprint_Powerful Purifier
reviews.reviewText: I use this little gadget cleans the air in my office, and it does a really good job. The small footprint allows it to be placed anywhere.The air purifier clears food and stale odors. The tech light blue accent light and three stage fan easily cleanses the room's air. On the lowest fan speed, the purifier is completely silent. I purchased a couple replacement filters for the future, since I plan to have this gadget for quite some time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Makes my nose stuffy
reviews.reviewText: Fits on nightstand, 3 speeds, blue "night light" option, quiet, unsure it's doing anything to clean the air. Nothing is fresher and my nose becomes stuffy while running the machine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is amazing! We use this in our home office that we smoke in when cold outside, and I can walk in the next morning and smell absolutely no trace of cigarette smoke. We run ot on low to medium. Very quiet. Highly recommend!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesnt last on high setting well, begins making weird noises
reviews.reviewText: Edit: they reached out to me and rectified the problem, so I am very happy with the customer service, and I can give it a positive rating and am satisifed that I bought it. Just be careful not to run it on high continously, or for too large of a room, but its decent quality and should do well on low/ish settings, and in a small space.This thing is cheap, but seems therefore...cheaply made. If you want to run it on high a lot, it does not seem to hold up, as it pretty quickly began making weird noises as it ran, after only a few weeks running it on high consistently. I upgraded to a better model (levoit) which is more than worth it. (Those last all the time on highest setting, and never make any squeaking noises....ever. these cheaper made units might only be useful when using more casually/only on low setting, but does not hold up well over time.)Also even after vacuuming the filter, the air coming out still smells bad, wheras larger purifiers you can vacuum filter + make it last longer. So it's another 10-15 bucks for a tiny filter, on a unit that makes noise, and doesnt last well. Just spend a little more money to get a levoit, which you can vacuum those filters and it evens out that way, for way better performance, and no noise.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Product! Noticable difference in air quality!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the H13 True HEPA Filter Air Purifier, and I am beyond impressed with its performance. This product has truly transformed the air quality in my home, making it a healthier and more enjoyable living space.The sleek design of the air purifier is standout feature. It seamlessly blends into any room without being an eyesore. The touch-sensitive controls are user-friendly, allowing me to easily adjust fan speeds and modes to suit my preferences. One of the most impressive aspects of the H13 True HEPA Filter Air Purifier is its whisper-quiet operation. Even at the highest fan speed, the noise level is barely noticeable. This makes it ideal for use in bedrooms, offices, or any other space where a peaceful environment is essential.The coverage area of this air purifier is also impressive, ensuring that it effectively cleans the air in larger rooms. The H13 True HEPA Filter Air Purifier has made a noticeable difference in the overall freshness of my home, eliminating odors and leaving the air feeling clean!

Works great for medium sized bedroom. Helps with pet odors. We have also had less sharing of colds between family members since we set up extra air purifiers in bedrooms and not just in the main living space. Good value for money. Quiet. Filters are also fairly cheap.

I am so very happy with this product! We have moved into a home that was heavily smoked in. Having it plugged in during the day and evening is wonderful. My home smells so much better now. The blue light is soft enough for a good sleep and the noise is so soft and gentle as well.

I bought 2 of these one for my bedroom and one for my living room. They work great. Only 1 thing so far: one of them squeaks which is okay if there are other things on in the room but not if you want quiet (to sleep etc). The other one is quite as expected. So far I like them and would buy them again - I have smaller rooms so they are great.
